      • search

        public List<AbstractPermissionsOwner> search(String query,
                                    boolean withUsers,
                                    boolean withGroups)
        Performs a cross search on every fields of users, groups and roles classes.
        Specified by:
        search in interface SearchService
        Parameters:
        query - The Lucene search query.
        withUsers - True to search on users.
        withGroups - True to search on groups.
        Returns:
        List of matching resources, that may be empty but not null.
